An ode made on the welcome news of the safe arrival and kind reception of the Scottish colony at Darien in America
1 sheet ([2] p.)
printed by James Watson in Craig's close, Edinburgh : 1699.
Verse - "Now is the time for Thanks and Praise;". Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
